alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier; Caddo; Claiborne; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 29 at 4:13AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Webster, southeastern Caddo, southwestern Claiborne, central Bienville and southeastern Bossier Parishes through 500 AM CDT... At 413 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles west of Ringgold to 8 miles south of Gibsland. Movement was north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Minden, Homer, Haughton, Ringgold, Sibley, Gibsland, Doyline, Dubberly, Dixie Inn, Heflin, Athens, Jamestown, Bryceland, Mount Lebanon, Curtis, Plum Orchard Landing, Koran, Gilark, Sailes and Noles Landing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
